Description: Given the following medical report text, classify the report into one of the categories 0, 1, 2, 3, or 4 based on the number of lesions with size specified in centimeters (capped at 4). Output the appropriate category.

reasoning.description: The clinical reasoning or evidence leading to the classification decision, based on symptoms, measurements, and recommendations.

label.description: The final classification. An integer from 0 to 4, representing the number of lesions with size specified in centimeters.
